description: This Java source file defines the PojoProcessor class, which processes and analyzes custom POJO objects within a service definition, including building dependencies and determining usage in events and IPC messages.

classes.name: PojoProcessor
classes.description: A helper class that processes custom object definitions, builds dependencies, and analyzes POJO usage in events and IPC messages within the service definition.

methods.name: buildModel
methods.description: Constructs a PojoProcessor instance, populates the pojoLookup map with PojoWrappers, and marks POJOs as in a List or Map based on their variables.

methods.name: analyze
methods.description: Analyzes the service for references to POJOs used in events and IPC messages, and builds dependency information for each PojoWrapper.

methods.name: analyzeAgain
methods.description: Logs warnings for POJOs that are not referenced by any event or IPC message, indicating unused definitions.

methods.name: getWrappers
methods.description: Returns an iterator over all PojoWrapper instances managed by this processor.

methods.name: getPojoForName
methods.description: Retrieves the PojoWrapper associated with a given variable name.
